fields.name: Trace:
fields.value: Follow your target. Learn the player(s) they visit and learn whether you alert to their odor (can't win with your target OR they have Rampage attack ability). Feedback for this ability is [player visited]: [alert/no alert].

fields.name: Widen Search (Passive):
fields.value: Starting the second time you place in the top half, you can target an additional player each night. For example, if you have placed in the top half four times, you can target four players each night. If you receive multiple feedback from Trace, it will be delivered in random order.

fields.name: Human Companionship (Locked, Passive):
fields.value: Triggered the first time you place in the top 3. Learn the identity of one other Town Investigative player, or one other Town player if no TIs exist. This ability ignores investigative modifiers.

fields.name: Feline Rivalry (Passive):
fields.value: The first time you visit any player with a Cat-themed role, you will automatically attack them in addition to any other ability used. This ability ignores investigative modifiers.

fields.name: Handler's Radio (Passive):
fields.value: You may read, but not speak in, a factional chat with other Police-subaligned players.
